name: sales_intelligence_agent
description: Sales intelligence agent for finding targeted business contacts and companies using Exa websets. Perfect for sales prospecting, lead generation, and market intelligence.
example_usage:
```python
from sales_intelligence import sales_intelligence_agent, find_sales_leaders

# Find sales leaders in Europe
result = await find_sales_leaders(
    company_size="less than 500 employees",
    location="Europe"
)

# Find marketing agencies
result = await sales_intelligence_agent(
    role_or_company="Marketing agency",
    company_size="less than 30 employees",
    location="US"
)
```
post_add_instructions: Make sure to set your EXA_API_KEY environment variable before using this agent.
